name: GlassMyFox Text Fixes
description: Fixes the color problems in the urlbar and identity bar/popup caused by GlassMyFox.
additional_info:
I created this by modifying two glommed together styles I found.
Transparent Identity Popup by dotter: http://userstyles.org/styles/9364/transparent-site-identity-popup 
Urlbar Identity-box label by rob64rock: http://userstyles.org/styles/49786/urlbar-identity-box-label-styled-fx-14

The very first line of code changes the color of the urlbar text. Just change that if you don't want it black.
